plans.suggestion: Asthma: Avoid high-sugar foods to prevent spikes in blood sugar.

DietPlan.Heading: Breakfast (500–600 kcal)-Oatmeal Bowl:
DietPlan.1: 1 cup cooked oats with almond milk.
DietPlan.2: 1 tbsp almond butter.

DietPlan.Heading: Mid-Morning Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.1: Handful of mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pistachios)
DietPlan.2: 1 boiled egg or tofu scramble on whole-grain toast.

DietPlan.Heading: Lunch (600–700 kcal)-Grilled Chicken or Tofu Salad:
DietPlan.2: Mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and 1/2 avocado.
DietPlan.4: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice.

DietPlan.Heading: Afternoon Snack (300–400 kcal)-Smoothie:
DietPlan.2: 1 scoop plant-based protein powder.

DietPlan.Heading: Dinner (500–600 kcal)-Grilled Salmon or Lentils:
DietPlan.1: 150g grilled salmon or 1 cup cooked lentils.
DietPlan.2: Steamed broccoli and carrots (drizzle with olive oil).

DietPlan.Heading: Optional Evening Snack (200–300 kcal)
DietPlan.1: 1 cup unsweetened coconut yogurt with a sprinkle of granola.
DietPlan.2: 1 tbsp sunflower seeds.

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken breast, salmon, eggs, tofu, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Oats, quinoa, brown rice, sweet potatoes, whole-grain bread.
Food to Include.3: Fruits: Bananas, berries, apples, avocados.
Food to Include.4: Vegetables: Leafy greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Healthy Fats: Olive oil, almond butter, chia seeds, nuts, seeds.

plans.suggestion: Asthma: Avoid high-sugar foods to prevent spikes in blood sugar.

DietPlan.Heading: Breakfast (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked oatmeal (with almond milk).
DietPlan.6: Add 1 tbsp chia seeds or 2 tbsp ground flaxseeds to oatmeal.
DietPlan.7: Include 1 boiled egg (or scrambled tofu if vegan).

DietPlan.Heading: Mid-Morning Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Handful of mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pistachios)
DietPlan.5: Add 1 tbsp of sunflower or pumpkin seeds.
DietPlan.6: Include a small slice of whole-grain bread with almond butter.

DietPlan.Heading: Lunch (600–700 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice.
DietPlan.4: Mixed vegetable salad with olive oil and lemon. dressing.
DietPlan.6: Add 1/2 avocado to the salad.

DietPlan.Heading: Afternoon Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup unsweetened coconut yogurt with berries.
DietPlan.5: Add a handful of granola to the yogurt.
DietPlan.6: Include 1 boiled egg or a small serving of hummus with carrots.

DietPlan.Heading: Dinner (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Grilled salmon or lentils (150g).
DietPlan.3: Steamed broccoli and carrots with olive oil.
DietPlan.6: Add 1 medium roasted sweet potato.

DietPlan.Heading: Optional Evening Snack (200–300 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 small handful of nuts or seeds.
DietPlan.4: Include a piece of dark chocolate (70% or higher).

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken, salmon, tofu, eggs, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Quinoa, oats, brown rice, sweet potatoes.
Food to Include.3: Healthy Fats: Avocado, olive oil, almond butter, nuts.
Food to Include.4: Fruits and Veggies: Berries, spinach, kale, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Dairy Alternatives: Unsweetened almond milk, soy milk, coconut yogurt.

plans.suggestion: Asthma: Avoid high-sugar foods to prevent spikes in blood sugar.

DietPlan.Heading: Breakfast (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked oatmeal (with almond milk).
DietPlan.6: Add 1 tbsp chia seeds or 2 tbsp ground flaxseeds to oatmeal.
DietPlan.7: Include 1 boiled egg (or scrambled tofu if vegan).
DietPlan.9: Increase portion of oats to 1.5 cups.
DietPlan.10: Add a handful of walnuts or pecans.

DietPlan.Heading: Mid-Morning Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Handful of mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pistachios)
DietPlan.5: Add 1 tbsp of sunflower or pumpkin seeds.
DietPlan.6: Include a small slice of whole-grain bread with almond butter.
DietPlan.8: Smoothie: Blend almond milk, 1/2 avocado, spinach, and unsweetened cocoa powder.

DietPlan.Heading: Lunch (600–700 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice.
DietPlan.4: Mixed vegetable salad with olive oil and lemon. dressing.
DietPlan.6: Add 1/2 avocado to the salad.
DietPlan.9: Increase protein to 200g (chicken, fish, or tofu).
DietPlan.10: Add 1 tbsp tahini dressing to vegetables.

DietPlan.Heading: Afternoon Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup unsweetened coconut yogurt with berries.
DietPlan.5: Add a handful of granola to the yogurt.
DietPlan.6: Include 1 boiled egg or a small serving of hummus with carrots.
DietPlan.8: Smoothie: Blend almond milk, banana, protein powder, and peanut butter.

DietPlan.Heading: Dinner (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Grilled salmon or lentils (150g).
DietPlan.3: Steamed broccoli and carrots with olive oil.
DietPlan.6: Add 1 medium roasted sweet potato.
DietPlan.9: Use 200g salmon, tofu, or lentils.
DietPlan.10: Include 1/2 cup chickpeas or kidney beans.

DietPlan.Heading: Optional Evening Snack (200–300 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 small handful of nuts or seeds.
DietPlan.4: Include a piece of dark chocolate (70% or higher).
DietPlan.6: Add 1 slice of whole-grain bread with almond butter.

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken, salmon, tofu, eggs, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Quinoa, oats, brown rice, sweet potatoes.
Food to Include.3: Healthy Fats: Avocado, olive oil, almond butter, nuts.
Food to Include.4: Fruits and Veggies: Berries, spinach, kale, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Dairy Alternatives: Unsweetened almond milk, soy milk, coconut yogurt.

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken breast, salmon, eggs, tofu, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Oats, quinoa, brown rice, sweet potatoes, whole-grain bread.
Food to Include.3: Fruits: Bananas, berries, apples, avocados.
Food to Include.4: Vegetables: Leafy greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Healthy Fats: Olive oil, almond butter, chia seeds, nuts, seeds.

plans.suggestion: Lactose Intolerance: Use plant-based milk like almond, soy, or oat milk.

DietPlan.Heading: Breakfast (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked oatmeal (with almond milk).
DietPlan.6: Add 1 tbsp chia seeds or 2 tbsp ground flaxseeds to oatmeal.
DietPlan.7: Include 1 boiled egg (or scrambled tofu if vegan).

DietPlan.Heading: Mid-Morning Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Handful of mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pistachios)
DietPlan.5: Add 1 tbsp of sunflower or pumpkin seeds.
DietPlan.6: Include a small slice of whole-grain bread with almond butter.

DietPlan.Heading: Lunch (600–700 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice.
DietPlan.4: Mixed vegetable salad with olive oil and lemon. dressing.
DietPlan.6: Add 1/2 avocado to the salad.

DietPlan.Heading: Afternoon Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup unsweetened coconut yogurt with berries.
DietPlan.5: Add a handful of granola to the yogurt.
DietPlan.6: Include 1 boiled egg or a small serving of hummus with carrots.

DietPlan.Heading: Dinner (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Grilled salmon or lentils (150g).
DietPlan.3: Steamed broccoli and carrots with olive oil.
DietPlan.6: Add 1 medium roasted sweet potato.

DietPlan.Heading: Optional Evening Snack (200–300 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 small handful of nuts or seeds.
DietPlan.4: Include a piece of dark chocolate (70% or higher).

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken, salmon, tofu, eggs, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Quinoa, oats, brown rice, sweet potatoes.
Food to Include.3: Healthy Fats: Avocado, olive oil, almond butter, nuts.
Food to Include.4: Fruits and Veggies: Berries, spinach, kale, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Dairy Alternatives: Unsweetened almond milk, soy milk, coconut yogurt.

plans.suggestion: Lactose Intolerance: Use plant-based milk like almond, soy, or oat milk.

DietPlan.Heading: Breakfast (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked oatmeal (with almond milk).
DietPlan.6: Add 1 tbsp chia seeds or 2 tbsp ground flaxseeds to oatmeal.
DietPlan.7: Include 1 boiled egg (or scrambled tofu if vegan).
DietPlan.9: Increase portion of oats to 1.5 cups.
DietPlan.10: Add a handful of walnuts or pecans.

DietPlan.Heading: Mid-Morning Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Handful of mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pistachios)
DietPlan.5: Add 1 tbsp of sunflower or pumpkin seeds.
DietPlan.6: Include a small slice of whole-grain bread with almond butter.
DietPlan.8: Smoothie: Blend almond milk, 1/2 avocado, spinach, and unsweetened cocoa powder.

DietPlan.Heading: Lunch (600–700 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice.
DietPlan.4: Mixed vegetable salad with olive oil and lemon. dressing.
DietPlan.6: Add 1/2 avocado to the salad.
DietPlan.9: Increase protein to 200g (chicken, fish, or tofu).
DietPlan.10: Add 1 tbsp tahini dressing to vegetables.

DietPlan.Heading: Afternoon Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 cup unsweetened coconut yogurt with berries.
DietPlan.5: Add a handful of granola to the yogurt.
DietPlan.6: Include 1 boiled egg or a small serving of hummus with carrots.
DietPlan.8: Smoothie: Blend almond milk, banana, protein powder, and peanut butter.

DietPlan.Heading: Dinner (500–600 kcal)
DietPlan.2: Grilled salmon or lentils (150g).
DietPlan.3: Steamed broccoli and carrots with olive oil.
DietPlan.6: Add 1 medium roasted sweet potato.
DietPlan.9: Use 200g salmon, tofu, or lentils.
DietPlan.10: Include 1/2 cup chickpeas or kidney beans.

DietPlan.Heading: Optional Evening Snack (200–300 kcal)
DietPlan.2: 1 small handful of nuts or seeds.
DietPlan.4: Include a piece of dark chocolate (70% or higher).
DietPlan.6: Add 1 slice of whole-grain bread with almond butter.

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken, salmon, tofu, eggs, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Quinoa, oats, brown rice, sweet potatoes.
Food to Include.3: Healthy Fats: Avocado, olive oil, almond butter, nuts.
Food to Include.4: Fruits and Veggies: Berries, spinach, kale, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Dairy Alternatives: Unsweetened almond milk, soy milk, coconut yogurt.

plans.suggestion: Heart Disease: Focus on unsaturated fats, avoid trans fats, and limit saturated fats.

DietPlan.Heading: Breakfast (500–600 kcal)-Oatmeal Bowl:
DietPlan.1: 1 cup cooked oats with almond milk.
DietPlan.2: 1 tbsp almond butter.

DietPlan.Heading: Mid-Morning Snack (300–400 kcal)
DietPlan.1: Handful of mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, pistachios)
DietPlan.2: 1 boiled egg or tofu scramble on whole-grain toast.

DietPlan.Heading: Lunch (600–700 kcal)-Grilled Chicken or Tofu Salad:
DietPlan.2: Mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and 1/2 avocado.
DietPlan.4: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice.

DietPlan.Heading: Afternoon Snack (300–400 kcal)-Smoothie:
DietPlan.2: 1 scoop plant-based protein powder.

DietPlan.Heading: Dinner (500–600 kcal)-Grilled Salmon or Lentils:
DietPlan.1: 150g grilled salmon or 1 cup cooked lentils.
DietPlan.2: Steamed broccoli and carrots (drizzle with olive oil).

DietPlan.Heading: Optional Evening Snack (200–300 kcal)
DietPlan.1: 1 cup unsweetened coconut yogurt with a sprinkle of granola.
DietPlan.2: 1 tbsp sunflower seeds.

Food to Include.Heading: Food to Include:
Food to Include.1: Proteins: Chicken breast, salmon, eggs, tofu, lentils, chickpeas.
Food to Include.2: Carbs: Oats, quinoa, brown rice, sweet potatoes, whole-grain bread.
Food to Include.3: Fruits: Bananas, berries, apples, avocados.
Food to Include.4: Vegetables: Leafy greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, carrots, broccoli.
Food to Include.5: Healthy Fats: Olive oil, almond butter, chia seeds, nuts, seeds.
